DOC.brief_summary: This open , multi-center , non comparative study evaluate safety efficacy Macrolane VRF30 female breast . 71 subject receive initial treatment maximum 120 ml Macrolane VRF30 per breast . 22 patient receive re-injection ( max 120 ml/breast ) Macrolane nine month initial treatment . Patients follow 24 month last treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Macrolane VRF30 Enhancement Shape Fullness Female Breast
DOC.criteria: Patients 25 60 year small breast seek enhancement shape fullness breast Unreasonable expectation regard increase breast volume Any medical condition may interfere way .
